about.title: About
about.description: I am a person with a passion for computer technologies and a desire to work with people from all over the world. I am a Frontend Developer, who likes to study new things and put this into practice. My brief self-description - a dedicated and responsible person with big goals.
about.need: Need more information about my skills? Download the CV.
